Release Notes for X-CUBE-CELLULAR 5.0.0 supported modems

SLA0048 license

Purpose

the X-CUBE-CELLULAR supported modems

  • This version of X-CUBE-CELLULAR supports 3 modems
  • Quectel module UG96 with Intel modem
  • Quectel module BG96 with Qualcomm modem
  • Sequans module GM01Q with Sequans modem

SW Architecture and supported HWs

5.0.0 / W1921

Main changes

Maintenance release

This V5.0.0 delivery is a new release with new features and there is no new HW supported

Additional features
Headline
New Cellular FW delivery, see its RN for more details on the contents, The current RN concerns only supported modems

Fixed bugs list
TicketHeadline
See Cellular framework RN for details about Cellular features

Contents

Components
NameVersionComment
Quectel UG96 FW Factory version is UG96LNAR02A06E1G aka 02A06 it is the same used for tests Your FW version should be this one so no need to update
Quectel BG96 FW Factory version is BG96MAR02A06M1G, version used for tests is BG96MAR02A08M1G_01.012.01.012 FW must be updated, see /Utilities/Modem_FW/BG96
Sequans GM01Q FW Factory version are UE5.2.1.0 LR5.2.1.0-41159, version used for tests is UE5.2.1.0 LR5.2.1.0-41159 Your FW version should be this one so no need to update

Known limitations


Requirements not met or planned in a forthcoming release
Ticket
Headline
See Cellular framework RN for requirement not met/planned details about cellular feature

Supported STM32 boards

  • P-L496G-CELL01
  • P-L496G-CELL02
  • 32L496GDISCOVERY
  • B-L475-IOT01A

Backward compatibility

Compliant with previous deliveries

Dependencies

This software release is compatible with: See Cellular Package (top) RN
